alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:57AM CDT until April 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.8 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 29.7 Tue 9 am CDT 29.8 29.7 29.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
